title: WTB: Hughie Jennings One Hand American Beauty.
author: Centauri

posts.post_title: WTB: Hughie Jennings One Hand American Beauty.
posts.post_content: Hit me up if you have one to sell
Also open to Broadleaf or Hindu. Drum and Uzit?

Ben,

I don't have any of those backs, but I do have this Sovereign available.  If interested, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Bill

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=605834&d=1705507240[/IMG]

Great card, but not looking for that one right now. Currently have:

Piedmont
Sweet Caporal 
Polar Bear
Sovereign
Cycle
EPDG
Old Mill
Tolstoi
Coupon
Lennox

Trying to grab the American Beauty, then the rare ones if they pop up. Don’t think Drum or Uzit will happen even if they came up for sale based on budget.
